title: 8 Tips For Dry Climate Gardening Without Irrigation (Dust Mulch Wide Spacing Hugelpaths Etc.)

tasks.task: Given the transcript, generate a list of physical tasks a person would have to perform with their body in relation to the content. Tasks should be general, formatted with MAINTASK followed by subtasks. Ensure tasks relate to farming or agriculture.

subtasks: Creating depressions for planting to capture rainwater
Using mulch (e.g., wood chips, straw) to prevent evaporation and weed growth
Spacing plants wider (50% more than推荐的) to reduce competition and improve water use
Using organic matter (compost) to improve soil structure and moisture retention
Implementing hugelkultur by burying wood to act as a moisture reservoir
Applying dust mulch when organic matter is insufficient
Pre-germinating seeds by soaking or using moist paper towels before planting
Planting in hills or clumps with spaces in between to minimize water competition
Allowing soil to dry slightly between waterings to encourage deeper root growth
Breaking up soil surface after heavy rain to maintain moisture
